item.Q:
Write the character:
refined (rice); the most refined; spirit; soul; vitality; energy; semen; sperm; mythical goblin spirit; highly perfected; elite; the pick of sth; proficient (refined ability); extremely (fine)
item.A:
jīng
精神 jīngshén vigor; vitality; drive; spiritual; mental; psychological

item.Q:
Write the character:
half; semi-; incomplete; (after a number) and a half; half
item.A:
bàn
半径 (半徑) bànjìng radius

item.Q:
Write the character:
appointment; agreement; to arrange; to restrict; approximately
item.A:
traditional: 約
yuē
大约 (大約) dàyuē approximately; about

item.Q:
Write the character:
hope; wish; desire; ready; willing
item.A:
愿 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 願
yuàn
愿意 (願意) yuànyì to wish; to want; ready; willing (to do sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
make or cause to be; order; command; decree; honorable
item.A:
lìng
命令 mìnglìng (an) order or command

item.Q:
Write the character:
background; bottom; base; the end of a period of time; towards the end of (last month)
item.A:
底 (strokes unavailable)
dǐ
彻底 (徹底) chèdǐ thorough; complete

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: reply; answer; return; respond; echo
2: to answer; agree
item.A:
1: dá 2: dā
回答 huídá reply; answer 答应 (答應) dāying reply; promise

item.Q:
Write the character:
to develop; to evolve; to practice; to perform; to play; to act
item.A:
yǎn
演出 yǎnchū to act (in a play); to perform; to put on (a performance)

item.Q:
Write the character:
attain; pass through; achieve; reach; realize; clear; inform; notify; dignity
item.A:
traditional: 達
dá
达到 (達到) dádào to reach; to achieve; to attain

雄 (strokes unavailable)
xióng
英雄 yīngxióng hero

深 (strokes unavailable)
shēn
深入 shēnrù penetrate deeply; thorough

item.Q:
Write the character:
bank note; ticket; a vote
item.A:
piào
投票 tóupiào to vote; vote

zǎo
早已 zǎoyǐ long ago; for a long time

yuàn
国务院 (國務院) guówùyuàn State Department (USA); State Council (China)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to reach; to be enough
item.A:
够 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 夠
gòu
能够 (能夠) nénggòu be capable of; can; is able

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: tune
2: tune; song
item.A:
1: qū 2: qǔ
曲线 (曲線) qūxiàn a curve; a curved shape; indirect; in a roundabout way 弯曲 (彎曲) wānqǔ bend

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: fake; false; artificial; to borrow; if; suppose
2: vacation
item.A:
1: jǐa 2: jìa
假定 jǐadìng to assume; to suppose 请假 (請假) qǐngjìa ask for time off

to speak; to talk; to converse; to chat; to discuss; surname Tan
item.A:
谈 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 談
tán
谈到 (談到) tándào to refer to; to speak about; to talk about

traditional: 術
shù

traditional: 能夠
nénggòu be capable of; can; is able

traditional: 達到
dádào to reach; to achieve; to attain
jīngshén vigor; vitality; drive; spiritual; mental; psychological
shēnrù penetrate deeply; thorough

traditional: 不夠
bùgòu not enough; insufficient; inadequate
búgòu not enough

traditional: 曲線
qūxiàn a curve; a curved shape; indirect; in a roundabout way
lǐxiǎng ideal
shàngxìa up and down; top and bottom; old and new
hǎoxiàng seem; be like

traditional: 建議
jiànyì to propose; to suggest; to recommend; proposal; suggestion; recommendation
rénkǒu population
wùlǐ physics; physical
chūqù to go out

traditional: 否則
fǒuzé if not; otherwise; else; or else

traditional: 卻不
quèbù but not
bùjiǔ not long (after); before too long; soon; soon after

traditional: 全體
quántǐ all; entire

traditional: 教師
jiàoshī teacher

traditional: 車間
chējiān workshop

traditional: 講話
jiǎnghuà a speech; to speak; to talk; to address
